item.title: Episode 131: Justin Keyes - Neovim
item.description: Olá pessoal e sejam bem-vindos à mais um episódio do Castálio Podcast! Our guest for today’s episode is Neovim maintainer, Vim contributor, and a software engineer. It is with a great pleasure that we welcome Justin Keyes to our podcast Listen while you read the show notes! MP3 OGG We talked about these topics How he started programming carrer What kind of software he is developing What is the programming language he uses at work How did he get started with Vim and its community Did he try Emacs?
